description:
Conan, Genta, Mitsuhiko, and Ayumi get caught in the rain and seek shelter in a mansion. At the mansion they meet servants Saburo and his wife Hana, as well as lodger Hideto. Chieko, wife of master of the house Otaguro, used a wheelchair but died in an accident two months earlier after falling from a cliff. Otaguro claims Chieko`s ghost has been visiting him since two weeks ago, and Conan and his friends witness a yellowish light and a wheelchair moving on its own. At Mitsuhiko`s insistence, Conan and the Detective Boys try to solve the mystery of the ghost, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Les Detective Boys et le manoir hanté
The Detective Boys and the Haunted House
